item.title: PI extreme mode weapon
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

In Java, the operator “=” is used to assign a value to a variable, the other operator “==” is used to compare values with two different variables or a variable and another value.

Read full topic

item.title: PI extreme mode weapon
item.dc:creator: @s_3_3_m_3 s 3 3 m 3
item.description:
@s_3_3_m_3 wrote:

Hello, i’ve added the weapon already into the server, now i want too make it so if somebody else gets ahold of it, they can’t hold it, unless their on extreme.

I tried adding this into itemassistant:

if(c.extremeMode = false) for(int i : extremeItems) if(wearID == i) { c.sendMessage("You must be on Extreme Mode to wear this item."); return false; }

Any idea what i can do too make it work? Help appreciated, thanks!

Read full topic
